description:
Photoshop for Beginners: Easy Double Exposure Effect

I have designed this course to teach you how to use Photoshop to create your own unique digital artwork. If you want to learn how to create digital illustrations that you can sell with great profit on image stocks like Shutterstock, Istock or Alamy - take this course!


I will show you most effective Photoshop tricks to achieve great results in a short time.

By the end of the course you will learn great non-destructive Photoshop techniques: you will be able to remove your subject from the background, artisticly combine multiple layers in one image and apply layer adjustments.

I strongly encourage you to experiment with your own ideas and to modify techniques that you are going to learn to create workflow that suits best your artistic needs.


Enrollment in this course includes access to follow-along lectures where you will learn the most effective way: in practice.

Joining for the course also includes

  • Access to the discussion forums
  • Access to all future lectures that will be added to this course (that may be a result of questions from the discussions forums) or new techniques related to portrait photography
  • Discount coupons for other new courses that I launch

See my bio on this page for more of my educational and professional background. Links to my portfolio are available in the last Lecture of the course.

What else?

Except the knowledge, You are going to get the lifetime access to all the high quality Supplementary Materials used in the Course.


Go Create!

Kasia Zmokla
title: Photoshop for Beginners: Easy Double Exposure Effect
